trans-unit.source: The Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you manage and submit all of your apps for Windows devices in one place.
trans-unit.target: The Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you manage and submit all of your apps for Windows devices in one place.

trans-unit.source: Using the Windows Dev Center dashboard
trans-unit.target: Using the Windows Dev Center dashboard

trans-unit.source: Using the Windows Dev Center dashboard
trans-unit.target: Using the Windows Dev Center dashboard

trans-unit.source: The Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you manage and submit all of your apps for Windows devices in one place.
trans-unit.target: The Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you manage and submit all of your apps for Windows devices in one place.

trans-unit.source: **Note** You must have a [developer account](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=615100) in order to access the Windows Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: **Note** You must have a [developer account](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=615100) in order to access the Windows Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: When you create a [create a submission for your app](app-submissions.md) (for the first time or as an update), you can [upload app packages](upload-app-packages.md) for any supported operating system, and the Store will automatically offer customers the package that will work best for them.
trans-unit.target: When you create a [create a submission for your app](app-submissions.md) (for the first time or as an update), you can [upload app packages](upload-app-packages.md) for any supported operating system, and the Store will automatically offer customers the package that will work best for them.

trans-unit.source: You can use the same [descriptions](create-app-descriptions.md) and [artwork](app-screenshots-and-images.md) for all of the operating systems your app supports, or you can [customize the description for specific platforms](create-platform-specific-descriptions.md).
trans-unit.target: You can use the same [descriptions](create-app-descriptions.md) and [artwork](app-screenshots-and-images.md) for all of the operating systems your app supports, or you can [customize the description for specific platforms](create-platform-specific-descriptions.md).

trans-unit.source: In-app products (IAPs) are managed independently of your app's submission.
trans-unit.target: In-app products (IAPs) are managed independently of your app's submission.

trans-unit.source: This brings you greater flexibility and the ability to make changes independently.
trans-unit.target: This brings you greater flexibility and the ability to make changes independently.

trans-unit.source: The Dev Center dashboard also offers capabilities for [app management and configuring services](app-management-and-services.md), [reviewing analytic data](analytics.md), [payout reporting](payout-summary.md), [promotion and customer engagement](app-promotion-and-customer-engagement.md), [beta testing](beta-testing-and-targeted-distribution.md), [distributing LOB apps to enterprises](distribute-lob-apps-to-enterprises.md), and much more.
trans-unit.target: The Dev Center dashboard also offers capabilities for [app management and configuring services](app-management-and-services.md), [reviewing analytic data](analytics.md), [payout reporting](payout-summary.md), [promotion and customer engagement](app-promotion-and-customer-engagement.md), [beta testing](beta-testing-and-targeted-distribution.md), [distributing LOB apps to enterprises](distribute-lob-apps-to-enterprises.md), and much more.

trans-unit.source: Tips for using the unified dashboard
trans-unit.target: Tips for using the unified dashboard

trans-unit.source: If you had previously published apps for Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1, or earlier OS versions, take a look at [How your app appears in the Store for Windows 10 customers](how-your-app-appears-in-the-store-for-windows-10-customers.md) to find out more about some of the changes in your app's listing for Windows 10 customers, and how we categorize your app's info in the new dashboard.
trans-unit.target: If you had previously published apps for Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.1, or earlier OS versions, take a look at [How your app appears in the Store for Windows 10 customers](how-your-app-appears-in-the-store-for-windows-10-customers.md) to find out more about some of the changes in your app's listing for Windows 10 customers, and how we categorize your app's info in the new dashboard.

trans-unit.source: Apps that were linked to share identity in the earlier Windows Phone Dev Center and Windows Store dashboard will appear as the same app in the Dev Center dashboard.
trans-unit.target: Apps that were linked to share identity in the earlier Windows Phone Dev Center and Windows Store dashboard will appear as the same app in the Dev Center dashboard.

trans-unit.source: No matter which OS versions your app supports, you'll manage it as one app.
trans-unit.target: No matter which OS versions your app supports, you'll manage it as one app.

trans-unit.source: The app will share the same details, such as price and category, across device types.
trans-unit.target: The app will share the same details, such as price and category, across device types.
